passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(3) > aside:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > ul:nth-child(3) > li:nth-child(3) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(3)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(3) > h5:nth-child(3)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(4) > h5:nth-child(3)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(5) > h5:nth-child(3)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > nav:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > nav:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
